### [Global Oil Production](https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/oil-production-by-country?time=earliest..1923)
* Oil production by Country and by Year.
* Inormation from 1900 to 2022. 
* The unit of analysis is Terawatt-Hour (TWh). 
* The most relevant information is the top 5 countries with more production over time.

***

<p align="center">
    <img src="./images/EIA.png" alt="" height="80">
</p>

### [U.S. Oil Production](https://www.eia.gov/dnav/pet/hist/LeafHandler.ashx?n=pet&s=mcrfpus2&f=m)
* Oil production by Month and by Year.
* Inormation from 1920 to 2022. 
* The unit of analysis is Thousand Barrels. 

***

<p align="center">
    <img src="./images/yahoo_finance.png" alt="" height="80">
</p>

### [Crude Oil Price (CL=F)](https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/CL%3DF/chart?p=CL%3DF#)
* Crude Oil Price by Day, by Month and by Year.
* Information from 2000 to 2022.
* The unit of analysis is the price of the barrel in U.S Dollars.

### [Inflation Rate](https://data.oecd.org/price/inflation-cpi.htm) 
* U.S. Inflation from the Consumer Price Index variations by Month and by Year.
* Information from 1956 to 2022.
* The unit of analysis is variations in decimal points.

***

<p align="center">
    <img src="./images/IMF.png" alt="" height="130">
</p>

### [Interest Rate](https://data.imf.org/regular.aspx?key=61545855) 
* U.S. Interest Rates by Year.
* Information from 1994 to 2022
* The unit of analysis is U.S. Dollars

***

### [Food Industry](https://finance.yahoo.com/) 
* Food and Beverages Companies:
  * Archer Daniels Midland Company (ADM) 
  * Tyson Foods, Inc (TSN)
  * Mondelez (MDLZ)
  * The Kraft Heinz Company (KHC)
  * General Mills (GIS)
* Information from January 2000 to December 2022.
* The unit of analsysis is U.S. Dollars.

***

### [Healthcare Industry](https://finance.yahoo.com/) 
* Healthcare Companies:
  * Johnson & Johnson (JNJ)
  * Eli Lilly And Co (LLY)
  * Novartis AG (NVS)
  * Pfizer Inc. (PFE)
  * Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc (TMO)
  * UnitedHealth Group Inc (UNH)
* Information from January 2000 to December 2022.
* The unit of analsysis is U.S. Dollars.

### [Bus Transport - Passenger Trips ](https://www.transit.dot.gov/ntd/data-product/monthly-module-raw-data-release) 
* Number of Bus Trips by Month and by Year.
* Information from 2002 to 2022.
* The unit of analysis is millions of Trips.

***

<p align="center">
    <img src="./images/BEA.png" alt="" height="80">
</p>

### [Air Transport - Personal Consumption Expenditures](https://apps.bea.gov/iTable/?isuri=1&reqid=19&step=4&categories=flatfiles&nipa_table_list=1) 
* Personal Consumption Expenditures on Air Transport by Month and by Year.
* Information from 1959 to 2022.
* The unit of analysis is millions of U.S. Dollars.

***

<p align="center">
    <img src="./images/BEA.png" alt="" height="80">
</p>

### [Bicycles - Personal Consumption Expenditures](https://apps.bea.gov/iTable/?isuri=1&reqid=19&step=4&categories=flatfiles&nipa_table_list=1) 
* Personal Consumption Expenditures on Bicycles and Accesories by Month and by Year.
* Information from 1959 to 2022.
* The unit of analysis is millions of U.S. Dollars.
